lead_paragraph: John O. Brennan, the deputy national security adviser for counterterrorism, received an ethics waiver from the White House to investigate the “systemic failures” before the failed airliner bombing on Christmas Day.
snippet: John O. Brennan, the deputy national security adviser for counterterrorism, received an ethics waiver from the White House to investigate the “systemic failures” before the failed airliner bombing on Christmas Day.

headline.main: Obama Aide Gets Waiver to Investigate Airline Plot
headline.print_headline: Obama Aide Gets Waiver To Investigate Airline Plot
